{"id":1784942084,"question_id":3964,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1759034892,"status":12,"status_display":"Memory Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1784942084/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Number of ZigZag Arrays II","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int zigZagArrays(int n, int l, int r) {\n        const int MOD = 1e9+7;\n        int d = r - l + 1;\n\n        vector<long long> up(d, 0), dw(d, 0);\n        for (int j=0; j<d; j++) {\n            dw[j] = d-j-1;\n            up[j] = j;\n        }\n\n        for (int i=0; i<n-2; i++) {\n            vector<long long> nup(d, 0), ndw(d, 0);\n            long long roll = 0;\n            for (int k=0; k<d; k++) {\n                nup[k] = roll;\n                roll += dw[k] % MOD;\n            }\n\n            roll = 0;\n            for (int k=d-1; k>=0; k--) {\n                ndw[k] = roll;\n                roll += up[k] % MOD;\n            }\n            dw.swap(ndw);\n            up.swap(nup);\n        }\n\n        long long sum = 0;\n        for (int j=0; j<d; j++)\n            sum += (dw[j] + up[j]) % MOD;\n        return sum % MOD;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"number-of-zigzag-arrays-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1230}
